title: 270-Pound High School Running Back Breaks Free of Defensive Swarm for Unlikely Touchdown
text:
Andress High School running back Travon Ware became an instant local hero in El Paso, and an internet sensation, when footage of his bulldozing, 78-yard touchdown run against Chapin High School was posted on Twitter.

Reporter Erik Elken and others in attendance at McKee Stadium on September 5 watched in amazement as Ware’s improbable touchdown formed the centerpiece of a 15-0 win.

Speaking to Elken’s station KVIA ABC-7, the 5-foot-10-inch, 267 lb Ware said the struggle through a deluge of tackles was “kinda hard,” with “everyone on my back.” Credit: Erik Elken via Storyful

Reporter Erik Elken and others in attendance at McKee Stadium on September 5 watched in amazement as Ware’s improbable touchdown formed the centerpiece of a 15-0 win. Speaking to Elken’s station KVIA ABC -7 , the 5-foot-10-inch, 267 lb Ware said the struggle through a deluge of tackles was “kinda hard,” with “everyone on my back.” Credit: Erik Elken via Storyful
